title: Disney Reportedly Fears ‘Snow White’ Will Be A “Financial Disaster”
description:

Now a report claims that they did so because they fear Snow White could become a “financial disaster” for the company. title: ‘IT’ Prequel Series ‘Welcome To Derry’ Gets Disappointing Update
description:
The WGA and SAG-AFTRA strikes this year have resulted in a number of production delays and cancellations. description:

title: ‘Terrifier 3’ Receives October 2024 Release Date
description:
The Terrifier movies have quickly become one of the biggest modern horror franchises. Now the franchise’s iconic antagonist, Art the Clown, is set to return for Terrifier 3 as soon as October 2024. And, better yet, this film will be set on an entirely different holiday than Halloween. The theatrical re-release of Terrifier 2 included […]

title: ‘Echo’ Trailer Reveals Marvel’s First TV-MA MCU Series
description:
The Marvel Cinematic Universe is often recognized for being produced on a PG-13 scale. Since the introduction of Disney Plus, however, Disney and Marvel Studios have been experimenting with pushing the limits of their franchise. Now the trailer for the new series Echo confirms it will be the first MCU series with a TV-MA rating. […]
